line_1: So lightly down he lays my Lady.
line_2: The Girl agog, the Gallant ready;

line_1: One glimpse of the fair lady.
line_2: With the Moslem Chief stayed he,

line_1: For you must know I'm turn'd fine lady,
line_2: I come down stairs, the cocoa ready, —

line_1: She's prettier much than her young lady,
line_2: But that, you know, full easily may be.

line_1: Nor tale, nor sonnet, for my lady,
By many a lord an' lady;
Present my best wishes unto the good lady,
line_2: Whose plate and potatoes to me are ay ready:
